channel.title: Writing is thinking on Audry Hsu
channel.description: Recent content in Writing is thinking on Audry Hsu

item.title: How to Hugo
item.description: Overview of Hugo site folder structure my-site/ ├── archetypes/ <-- templates for new content │ └── default.md ├── assets/ ├── content/ │ └── posts/ │ └── _index.md │ └── first-post.md │ └── quotes/ ├── data/ <-- data files e.g. JSON ├── i18n/ ├── layouts/ ├── public/ <-- created when you build your site ├── resources/ <-- created when you build your site ├── static/ |── themes/ <-- downloaded prebuild templates (git submodule) └── hugo.

item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m Audry👋 Here’s a little bit about me: 💻 I’m a software engineer at Ookla, where I help build products that turn billions of real-time data points into global network intelligence and insights. 🐧 I created Fána, an open-source feature flagging platform specializing in audience-targeting to help developers test new features in production. 🌱 I’m always on the lookout for ways that I can create new things and have fun while doing it 📈 Formerly a data management consultant helping clients manage their regulatory data & modernize their legal operations.
